attributes.action: Bring an end to the production of fuel fed cars, and produce ONLY electric cars
attributes.additional_details:
They can reduce emissions and even save you money. Fueling with electricity offers some advantages not available in conventional internal combustion engine vehicles. 
Better for the environment. Less pollution: By choosing to drive an EV you are helping to reduce harmful air pollution from exhaust emissions. An EV has zero exhaust emmissions5. Renewable energy: If you use renewable energy to recharge your EV, you can reduce your greenhouse gas emissions even further.
attributes.background: If people really want to save the planet we should act in every way rather than the easier options. These electric cars should be accessible to anyone looking to buy and drive a car, therefore they should be reasonable prices, especially if we want to make a significant difference to the planet.
